text: Jim van Fessem (born 7 August 1975 in Tilburg) is a retired Dutch football goalkeeper. ==Club career== Van Fessem played for Willem II, Vitesse Arnhem, ADO Den Haag, De GraafschapVan Fessem vervangt vDijk bij De Graafschap - Voetbal International and NACNAC contracteert Jim van Fessem - BN De Stem in the Dutch Eredivisie. ==International career== He represented the Netherlands at the 1995 FIFA World Youth Championship and earned 17 caps for the Netherlands national under-21 football team.KNVB Profile - Ons Oranje == Statistics == {| class="wikitable" border="1" |----- !
